alert.note: Alert for Eastern, Central, and Southern Searcy County Higher Elevations; Johnson County Higher Elevations; Marion; Newton County Higher Elevations; Newton County Lower Elevations; Northwest Searcy County Higher Elevations; Pope County Higher Elevations; Searcy County Lower Elevations (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 11 at 8:54AM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Searcy, Newton, northeastern Johnson, southwestern Marion and north central Pope Counties through 945 AM CDT... At 854 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Lost Valley State Park to near Walnut to near Devils Knob. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Jasper... Western Grove... Dillen... Carver... Erbie... Moore... Point Peter... Devils Knob... Eula... Piercetown... Walnut... Pruitt... Bertha... Rosetta... Upper Buffalo Wilderness Area... St. Joe... Pindall... Ben Hur... Bass... Marble Falls... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
